body:
I am sorry but I am really confused... I retrieved my whatsapp password using shirioko's whatsapi ;) nice app...

I have tried so many stuff to try to log in with custom password... and none worked!

Ps: I know the pass is right because i used it in wapi net from shirioko and it worked


So please can someone tell me what to do exactly?

nb:sry for being such a n00b -.- but i tried too many times

comment_data.body: ![capture decran 2013-05-11 a 21 29 53](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/2884258/491896/d4b7bdb8-ba68-11e2-8082-2ad29249fc2f.png)

Hi can you guys please explain me, how this custom password works
On May 12, 2013 12:00 AM, "kingofcracking" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> [image: capture decran 2013-05-11 a 21 29 53]<https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/2884258/491896/d4b7bdb8-ba68-11e2-8082-2ad29249fc2f.png>
>
> —
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub<https://github.com/venomous0x/WhatsAPI/issues/343#issuecomment-17764942>
> .
>

Well it's working from what I can see.

Since you're using venomous0x master and not my fork you need to call PollMessages after sending a message.

The custom password is a password you receive from WhatsApp when using checkCredentials or registerCode. You need it to log in to WhatsApp using LoginWithPassword.
using ur fork:
![capture decran 2013-05-11 a 22 09 28](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/2884258/491951/5c60091e-ba6e-11e2-971e-c6b2bab4ecbb.png)
and this is whatsapp.php file

Obvious error is obvious.
You're calling $wa->PollMessages() instead of $w->PollMessages()
pff sry i am really not into it this time:P
And use testprotocol.php instead of whatsapp.php.
why?

I am logging in but then I am getting A LOT of errors!

The files i am using:

khallas.php
whatsprot.class.php (from ur fork, shirioko)

pff I am getting bored of that! I think the error is there:
[from] => 1368352238-1@g.us
                    [id] => 1368352238-1
                    [type] => error
                    [t] => 1368352238




how to finally solve this problem?

Dear shirioko, can you send me a new khallas.php?!
Or is the error i  whatsprot.class.php (yours!)

How dare you?? :o

Haha the error you're getting is from a group JID, and given that you get 401 unauthorized error code I'm assuming you're not a participant of the group?

The command I wrote is:
apple-2:php Apple$ php khallas.php -i 96171613321

And 96171613321 is a number not a grp jid


And I sware i dont know from where this jid come: 1368352238-1@g.us (i only belong to one grp and its jid is  smthg else!)
Help please!
please answer shirioko
I can't seem to grasp the problem. You are still able to send and receive messages, right?
In whatsapp yes; in whatsapi no... i think the problem is a bug in the node function or in message function... can u send me by email a fresh whatsapi with custom password compatibility?

No, WhatsApi works fine. Get a fresh copy here:
https://github.com/venomous0x/WhatsAPI/archive/master.zip
Okay and with whatsapi the only thing I change is calling loginwithpassword($password) instead of login?
that's right.

Using whatsapi i downloaded from the link, and only changing Login to LoginWithPassword($pass), with the command : php whatsapp.php -i 96171613321 (my friend)

 i am getting the same error:

[from] => 1368352238-1@g.us
[id] => 1368352238-1
[type] => error
[t] => 1368352238

WTF
even when setting status:

Ok.

Yowsup registration working?

title: Login with a custom password
